subject: Water Polo
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The United States women’s team named Adam Krikorian of U.C.L.A. as coach, replacing Guy Baker. Krikorian, 34, led the Bruins to seven national titles in the past 10 years and will step down as the head women’s coach at U.C.L.A. He will remain an assistant for the Bruins’ men’s team.
